packs.descriptionBm: Pengalaman Astro baharu sudah tiba, dengan Jaminan Wang Dikembalikan! Info lanjut Daftar sekarang dan nikmati langganan 1-bln PERCUMA, serta akses tanpa caj untuk satu hiburan tambahan pilihan anda selama 24-bln! !*Tertakluk pada T&S

packs.titleBm: Lebih banyak pek anda akan nikmati

value.titleEn: Need more details about our TV packs? We got you!
value.titleBm: Perlukan butiran lanjut tentang pek TV kami? Kami dapat awak!

cta.textEn: Chat with our representative via WhatsApp

description.textEn: Catch all live local & international sporting actions including Liga Malaysia, Premier League, F1, MotoGP & UFC in one pack.
description.textBm: Saksikan semua aksi sukan tempatan & antarabangsa secara langsung termasuk Liga Malaysia, Liga Perdana, F1, MotoGP & UFC dalam satu pek.

description.textEn: Add Netflix Standard, Korean and Horror at +RM30/bln only!
description.textBm: Tambah Netflix Standard, saluran Korea & Horror pada +RM30/ bln sahaja!

description.textEn: Catch all the live sporting actions at the home of sports, and now with the best of Korean, Horror shows, and Netflix.
description.textBm: Saksikan semua acara langsung sukan dalam pek Sports Plus baharu. Kini dengan drama Korea, filem seram terhebat, dan Netflix.

description.textEn: Take family time to new heights with local & international favourites
description.textBm: Masa bersama keluarga kini lebih hebat dengan pelbagai kegemaran rancangan tempatan & antarabangsa

description.textEn: Discover award-winning films and original series at the home of movies, which includes Disney+ Hotstar & HBO
description.textBm: Temui pelbagai seleksi filem & siri original terbaik di destinasi filem termasuk Disney+ Hotstar & HBO

description.textEn: Add Netflix Standard, Korean and Horror at +RM35/bln only!
description.textBm: Tambah Netflix Standard, saluran Korea & Horror pada +RM35/ bln sahaja!

description.textEn: Award-winning films and original series with the all-new Movies Plus pack. From the best of Disney+ Hotstar, HBO and now Korean, Horror shows and Netflix.
description.textBm: Award-winning films and original series with the all-new Movies Plus pack. From the best of Disney+ Hotstar, HBO and now Korean, Horror shows and Netflix.

description.textEn: Experience a Premium selection at the home of movies & sports, which includes Movies Pack from Disney+ Hotstar, HBO and Sports Pack, all in one place.
description.textBm: Alami seleksi premium di destinasi filem & sukan termasuk Pek Movies daripada Disney+ Hotstar, HBO & Pek Sports, semua di satu tempat.

description.textEn: Get an amazing viewing experience at the home of sports & entertainment, featuring Sports Pack and Entertainment Plus Pack (with Netflix). Complimentary Astro GO+ until 14th Mar 2023
description.textBm: Dapatkan pengalaman tontonan hebat di destinasi sukan & hiburan, memaparkan Pek Sukan & Pek Entertainment Plus (dengan Netflix). Percuma Astro GO+ sehingga 14hb Mar 2023

description.textEn: Be captivated at the home of movies & entertainment, with the best of streaming apps you love in one place including Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar & HBO GO.
description.textBm: Terpesona di destinasi filem & hiburan dengan aplikasi penstriman terhebat yang anda gemari di satu tempat termasuk Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar & HBO GO.

description.textEn: Delight your loved ones at the home of entertainment, containing a wider selection of local, international & kids titles. You can also choose to have any one of our Asian Favourites
description.textBm: Hiburkan keluarga anda di destinasi hiburan yang mempunyai pelbagai seleksi tempatan, antarabangsa & kanak-kanak

description.textEn: Add Netflix Standard, Korean and Horror at +RM40/mth only!
description.textBm: Tambah Netflix Standard, saluran Korea & Horror pada +RM40/ bln sahaja!

description.textEn: Now you can immerse yourself with full access to Netflix on Astro Box & your other preferred devices. Catch also the best of Korean & Horror shows.
description.textBm: Kini anda boleh menikmati akses penuh ke Netflix di Astro Box & peranti pilihan anda. Saksikan jua rancangan Korean & Horror terhebat.

description.textEn: Be captivated at the home of movies & entertainment, with the best of streaming apps you love in one place including Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar & HBO GO.
description.textBm: Anda berhak hiburan terbaik dengan pek yang mengandungi semua termasuk Netflix, Pek Movies (Disney+ Hotstar), Pek Sports & Pek Entertainment Plus. Termasuk Astro GO+

en.title: What is Astro GO？
en.description:
Astro GO is a free streaming companion app for all Astro customers to enjoy their favourite shows and channels on their smartphones, tablets, and computers – anytime, anywhere in Malaysia. Astro customers with an active Pay-TV subscription can link their accounts to watch corresponding on demand and TV channels available on Astro GO as part of their subscription.

‍

en.title: Do I have to pay extra to use Astro GO?
en.description:
No, Astro GO is a free app for Astro customers. The content available on Astro GO will depend on the subscription pack that you aresubscribed to.


If you do not have an Astro subscription, please click here to find out packages available.

en.title: What can I watch on Astro GO?
en.description:
Your access to Astro GO will depend on the subscription pack that you are subscribed to. Not all shows/channels will be available on Astro GO as this depends on contractual rights with specific guidelines on the entitlement of these shows/channels. We are continuously working hard to make more content available on Astro GO.

‍

You may navigate around the menu on the side bar on Astro GO app, or top bar on the Astro GO web version to find shows available.

Menu Guide:

Home: Check out all the recommended content or watch your subscribed TV channels via the Channel Guide at the bottom of your home screen.

Catch Up: Missed an episode of your favourite series? Fret not, Catch Up on the latest episode of your favourite shows on Astro GO.

Boxsets: Watch complete seasons and series from our On Demand library anytime anywhere.

Movies: Watch recent and popular movies on your devices! You can access a large catalogue of On Demand movies, according to your subscription.

Kids: Catch all the cartoons, animations and a variety of shows for kids of all ages.

Sports: Watch the biggest sporting shows LIVE on your mobile device, anytime anywhere.

Store: Other than your subscribed packages, you can also purchase and watch your favourite Pay-Per-View movies and other Astro exclusive content (not available on iOS devices).

‍

en.title: Can I use Astro GO without an Astro subscription?
en.description: No. Astro GO is a FREE entitlement exclusively for customers with an Astro subscription. If you do not have an Astro subscription account, please visit product.astro.com.my/tv to find out more.

en.title: What is the difference between Astro GO and Astro GO+?
en.description:
Astro GO is a companion app that is complimentary for all Astro subscribers and allows up to 2 users to stream at the same time. 200 hours of cloud recording come complimentary with your Pay TV subscription*.


Astro GO+ is an add-on service that enables up to 4 users to watch Astro GO and Multiroom Smart TV at the same time (simultaneously). The amount of cloud recording storage will also be increased to 1500 hours.

‍


*Cloud recording hours are shared across your Astro Box, Astro GO and Multiroom Smart TV

en.title: Your Astro Box is better with a reliable connection
en.description: Level up your home entertainment with Astro Fibre – our internet plans with TV pack bundles that match every need and budget, from only RM99.00 / mth!

bm.title: Your Astro Box is better with a reliable connection
bm.description: Level up your home entertainment with Astro Fibre – our internet plans with TV pack bundles that match every need and budget, from only RM99.00 / mth!

en.title: What is Ultra Box?
en.description:
The Ultra Box is Astro’s latest generation of 4K UHD enabled box with Cloud recording feature, redesigned new interface, and a dedicated UHD channel. Just connect the Ultra Box to the internet and take control of your entertainment and explore over 60,000 videos that are waiting to be streamed, anytime.

‍

The new interface on Astro Ultra Box offers an enhanced viewing experience with a brand- new look and feel with features such as:

  • Discover VOD - Discover 60,000 videos, stream anytime, anywhere
  • Play from Start - You missed the start? Just restart
  • Multi-Screen - Stream seamlessly across any device

en.title: What is Ulti Box?
en.description:
Astro introduces the new Ulti Box with a redesigned new interface, Cloud recording feature, enhanced search capabilities and more. Just connect the all new Ulti Box to the Internet and take control of your entertainment and stream up to 60,000 videos on demand, anytime.

‍

The features of the new Ulti Box include:

  • Discover VOD - Discover 60,000 videos, stream anytime, anywhere
  • Play from Start - You missed the start? Just restart
  • Multi-Screen - Stream seamlessly across any device

en.title: Am I eligible for the Ultra Box / Ulti Box?
en.description:
Customers must be an existing or new Astro customer (NJOI customers are not eligible).

‍

For the Ultra Box, the following criteria applies: 

  • - Have an internet connection at home (recommended >10Mbps speed)
  • - Maintain a minimum subscription with a HD + Recording service

  • If you live in a high-rise building, please call us at 03-7481 8000 to check if your building can support the Ultra Box. If your high-rise building allows for the set-up of individual dishes you will be able to upgrade to the Ultra Box, subject to the criteria above.

  • We recommend a 4K UHD supported TV that is HDCP2.2 compliant to access the Astro UHD channels.

Note: If you do not have an internet connection at home, you may take up the Ultra Box bundled with Astro & Broadband package with rebates up to RM39 / month. You will enjoy free installation of Ultra Box when you sign up for Astro & Broadband bundle packages with Entertainment Pack and above. For more details and to sign up for Astro & Broadband, please click here.


For the Ulti Box, the following criteria applies:

  • - New Astro customers with a Primary Pack subscription will receive the Ulti Box with a choice of 24/12/0-month box commitment.
  • - Have an internet connection at home (recommended >10Mbps speed).


Note: Existing Ultra Box customers are not eligible for a swap to the Ulti Box. If your existing box is a PVR, you will lose access to all the recordings stored in the PVR


For new Multiroom subscriptions, customers subscribing for an additional Multiroom subscription will receive the Ulti Box as part of the subscription. You will also be required to upgrade to our new Astro packages to add a Multiroom.

en.title: What is Multi-User Profile?
en.description:
Multi-User Profile is our latest feature where users can create multiple profiles within the household. Different profiles will tailor your Astro experience to suit your preference including choosing your own avatar, having personalized shows recommended to you based on your past shows, personal Favourites and a profile for Kids with Kids-friendly shows as well.

‍

Read more about our Multi-User profile here.

en.title: How do I contact Astro for more information?
en.description: Call 03-7481 8000 or click the WhatsApp button below to start a conversation with us. You can also walk in to our Customer Service Centres and we will be more than happy to help you out.

title.bm: Need more details about our Multiroom? We got you!
title.en: Need more details about our Multiroom? We got you!

en.title: Your best pick comes in a pack
en.description: Complete your home with an Astro TV pack from only RM59.99 / mth! Choose from our inclusive packages, plus broadband offers and more.

bm.title: Your best pick comes in a pack
bm.description: Complete your home with an Astro TV pack from only RM59.99 / mth! Choose from our inclusive packages, plus broadband offers and more.

en.title: What is Multiroom (Smart TV)?
en.description: Multiroom (Smart TV) is a secondary subscription that allows you to enjoy your favourite Astro shows instantly in different rooms at the same time on your Smart TV. Subscribe to Multiroom (Smart TV) at promotion price of RM14.99* / month (excl. any govt. tax), and simply download the Astro app on your second TV-screen and connect to your home Wi-Fi to stream.

en.title: What are the Smart TV models supported by Multiroom (Smart TV)?
en.description:
Currently the Multiroom (Smart TV) app is supported on four (4) brands with the software version listed below:


i. Samsung TV 2018 Model and above with OS Tizen 4.0 and above

ii. LG TV 2018 Model and above with Web OS 4.0 and above

iii. Sharp Android TV version 8.0 & above

iv. Sony Android TV version 8.0 & above


To download the full list, click here.

en.title: Does the Multiroom (Smart TV) utilise one (1) of my Astro GO concurrency?
en.description:
Yes, the Multiroom (Smart TV) will utilise one (1) of your Astro GO concurrency.

Customers subscribing to Multiroom (Smart TV) can enjoy access up to 4 concurrency (watch 4 screens at the same time) which is shared across one Smart TV device and 3 mobile/laptop/tablet device(s), for limited period only. The default is 2 concurrency per Astro account.

en.title: What is the difference between Multiroom (Astro Box) and Multiroom (Smart TV)?
en.description: Multiroom (Astro Box) requires an Astro box to be setup and can be accessed through the regular satellite feed or streaming on home Wi-Fi. Meanwhile, the Multiroom (Smart TV) only requires a Smart TV and no installation needed. Customer can download the Astro app on the Smart TV and connect to home Wi-Fi to stream.

en.title: What are the minimum requirements for each Multiroom type?
en.description:
Multiroom(Smart TV)

Any active Astro subscriber with a main subscription on new Astro packs(Primary pack onwards) are able to subscribe to Multiroom (Smart TV) at RM29.99 monthly (subscription price excludes Govt Tax and is subject to Govt Tax if applicable).


Multiroom(Astro Box)

Any active Astro subscriber with a main subscription of RM100 or more can now choose to subscribe Multiroom (Astro Box) service at a price of RM49.99 monthly (subscription price excludes Govt Tax and is subject to Govt Tax if applicable).Both Multiroom service must be installed at the same registered address as your main subscription


Learn more here

en.title: Where can I get more information about Multiroom?
en.description: To view the terms and conditions, click here.

en.title: Why is Astro introducing new packs?
en.description:
As our customers deserve the best entertainment experience, Astro is refreshing its content and packages to offer more choice, value, flexibility, and better experience in a streaming world as part of the new Astro experience.

‍

The all-new Astro packs are designed for customers in the streaming and connected world, where they can stream all the shows they love on Ultra Box and Ulti Box. Customers can now enjoy their favourite shows all on Astro, from global streaming services like Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, HBO GO, iQIYI, TVBAnywhere+ as well as all Astro’s flagship shows and the best of live sports in one place, on the big screen. Our new packages offer unbeaten value, a greater variety of content and greater convenience, all made better with our Astro & Broadband for better connectivity.

en.title: I am an existing Astro customer; must I get the new packs?
en.description: No, you can remain in your current pack, however starting 9 November 2021, you would need to subscribe to the new packages to make any changes to your subscription. We strongly encourage customers to switch to the new packs to enjoy the best content experience from Astro.

en.title: I am a new Astro customer; must I get the new packs?
en.description: Yes, starting 9 November 2021, these new packs will be Astro’s default offering.

en.title: As a current Astro customer, will I be charged a switching fee for moving to these new packs?
en.description: There are no switching fees apply when existing Astro customer move to new packs.

bm.title: Kenapa Astro memperkenalkan pek-pek baharu?
bm.description:
Oleh kerana pelanggan kami layak mendapat pengalaman hiburan yang terbaik, Astro memperbaharui semula rancangan dan pakej untuk menawarkan lebih pilihan, nilai, fleksibiliti, dan pengalaman yang lebih baik dalam dunia penstriman sebagai sebahagian daripada pengalaman Astro baharu.

Pek Astro baharu direka untuk pelanggan dalam dunia penstriman dan rangkaian dunia, di mana mereka boleh menstrim semua rancangan yang mereka minati pada Ultra Box dan Ulti Box. Kini pelanggan boleh menikmati semua rancangan kesukaan mereka di Astro, daripada perkhidmatan penstriman global seperti Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, HBO GO, iQIYI, TVBAnywhere+ juga semua rancangan utama Astro dan siaran langsung sukan dalam satu tempat, pada skrin besar. Pakej baharu kami menawarkan nilai yang tiada bandingnya, pelbagai rancangan dan keseronokan terhebat semuanya lebih baik dengan sambungan Astro Broadband kami.Pek Astro baharu direka untuk pelanggan dalam dunia penstriman dan rangkaian dunia, di mana mereka boleh menstrim semua rancangan yang mereka minati pada Ultra Box dan Ulti Box. Kini pelanggan boleh menikmati semua rancangan kesukaan mereka di Astro, daripada perkhidmatan penstriman global seperti Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, HBO GO, iQIYI, TVBAnywhere+ juga semua rancangan utama Astro dan siaran langsung sukan dalam satu tempat, pada skrin besar. Pakej baharu kami menawarkan nilai yang tiada bandingnya, pelbagai rancangan dan keseronokan terhebat semuanya lebih baik dengan sambungan Astro Broadband kami.

bm.title: Saya pelanggan sedia ada Astro; perlukah saya melanggan pek baharu?
bm.description: Tidak, anda boleh kekal dalam pek semasa anda, tapi mulai 9 November 2021, anda perlu melanggan pakej baharu untuk membuat sebarang perubahan pada langganan anda. Kami amat menggalakkan pelanggan beralih kepada pek baharu untuk menikmati pengalaman rancangan terbaik daripada Astro.

bm.title: Saya pelanggan Astro baharu; perlukah saya melanggan pek baharu?
bm.description: Ya, bermula 9 November 2021, pek baharu ini akan menjadi tawaran asas Astro.

bm.title: Sebagai pelanggan Astro sedia ada, adakah saya akan dikenakan caj penukaran bila beralih kepada pek baharu ini?
bm.description: Tiada caj penukaran dikenakan apabila pelanggan Astro sedia ada bertukar kepada pek baharu.

entries.title: What is Astro Fibre?
entries.description: Astro Fibre is Astro’s own internet service that enables you to enjoy Astro content while staying connected with high-speed fibre broadband. You will enjoy substantial discounts by choosing your desired broadband speed of 50 Mbps to 800 Mbps to accompany your Astro TV packages.
